channel.title: Can rs servers run on a linux vps?
channel.description:
well i have owned a few server and i have always paid for a windows base system i know you can run java on linux but how?
thanks -vista

item.title: Can rs servers run on a linux vps?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“jmood128, post:3, topic:366867”][quote author=vistadosentwork link=topic=463063.msg3387108#msg3387108 date=1288556207]
well i have owned a few server and i have always paid for a windows base system i know you can run java on linux but how?

thanks -vista
[/quote]

I would think Jagex uses Linux to host its servers.[/quote]

Jagex does use Linux on their servers.

And of course RS private servers also can run under Linux, all server software runs much better under Linux than Windows.

Read full topic
item.source: Can rs servers run on a linux vps?

item.title: Can rs servers run on a linux vps?
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Yes, they can. Also, I’d advise you get used to Linux terminal commands before actually trying.
